name: Tactris
description:
Tactris is a tactical game that mixes classics like Tetris, Puyo-puyo and breakout into a single game.

The objective of the game is to use your formations of units to break through the opposing forces and reach their rear. You do this by matching your pieces with theirs - if any clump of units contains three matching copies of the good guys, then they pop and score points, taking out any corresponding baddies at the same time!

If you reach the back of the board, all remaining enemies are defeated, netting you big points, and advancing you on to the next level!

These are your units, the cavalry, archer, mage, rogue and knight. These are the enemy units, cavalry, archer, mage, rogue and knight.

I'd like to build on the game more in the future, with potentially the following content:

  • Audio
  • Scoreboards
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Different enemy design
  • New enemies
  • More backgrounds
  • Bosses
  • and loads more, I can't keep listing them all!
